Rulings.Tengu: ● This card does not destroy itself (it's still sent to the GY when the chain resolves).
Rulings.Goat:
● Would a Field Spell Card be destroyed by “Heavy Storm” or “Harpie’s Feather Duster”? 
A: Yes it would be destroyed by “Heavy Storm” or “Harpie's Feather Duster.”
